sentences.sentence: Snow geese are very gregarious birds.
Production of the foie gras pt involves force-feeding geese and ducks so that their livers swell.
sentences.translation: 肥鹅肝产品是用强行灌食后肿胀起的鸭肝和鹅肝制成的。

sentences.sentence: Approved methods might include destruction of nests and eggs, and the trapping and destruction of geese.
sentences.translation: 得到正式认可的方法可能包括对巢和蛋的捣毁以及对鹅的捕杀。
